name: The Tables Have Turned
description:
TURN FULLSCREEN MODE FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE!

Disclaimer: This game was made under 24h (not 72h)

The tables have turned is a really simple turn-based(pun intended) game, where you try not to fall through the cracked floor of a turning room. Yes you heard me right, a turning room. You can use the  furniture in your room to not fall down, or you could simply jump over the cracked pieces.

The controls are really simple:

Press: A & D           or           Left Arrow  & Right Arrow    -----> To move left and right

Press: Space   -----> To jump
